org.dkpro.core.io.brat

Class BratWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.uima.analysis_component.AnalysisComponent_ImplBase
      • org.apache.uima.analysis_component.Annotator_ImplBase
        • org.apache.uima.analysis_component.JCasAnnotator_ImplBase
          • org.apache.uima.fit.component.JCasConsumer_ImplBase
            • org.dkpro.core.api.io.JCasFileWriter_ImplBase
              • org.dkpro.core.io.brat.BratWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.uima.analysis_component.AnalysisComponent

    public class BratWriter
extends JCasFileWriter_ImplBase
    Writer for the brat annotation format.

    Known issues:

    • Brat is unable to read relation attributes created by this writer.
    • PARAM_TYPE_MAPPINGS not implemented yet
    See Also:
    brat standoff format, brat configuration format

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.dkpro.core.api.io.JCasFileWriter_ImplBase

        JCasFileWriter_ImplBase.NamedOutputStream

    • Field Detail

      • PARAM_TEXT_FILENAME_EXTENSION

        public static final String PARAM_TEXT_FILENAME_EXTENSION
        Specify the suffix of text output files. Default value .txt. If the suffix is not needed, provide an empty string as value.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PARAM_FILENAME_EXTENSION

        public static final String PARAM_FILENAME_EXTENSION
        Specify the suffix of output files. Default value .ann. If the suffix is not needed, provide an empty string as value.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PARAM_EXCLUDE_TYPES

      • PARAM_TEXT_ANNOTATION_TYPES

        public static final String PARAM_TEXT_ANNOTATION_TYPES

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PARAM_RELATION_TYPES

        public static final String PARAM_RELATION_TYPES
        Types that are relations. It is mandatory to provide the type name followed by two feature names that represent Arg1 and Arg2 separated by colons, e.g. de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.syntax.type.dependency.Dependency:Governor:Dependent .
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PARAM_ENABLE_TYPE_MAPPINGS

        public static final String PARAM_ENABLE_TYPE_MAPPINGS
        Enable type mappings.

      • PARAM_TYPE_MAPPINGS

        public static final String PARAM_TYPE_MAPPINGS
        FIXME
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PARAM_WRITE_RELATION_ATTRIBUTES

        public static final String PARAM_WRITE_RELATION_ATTRIBUTES
        The brat web application can currently not handle attributes on relations, thus they are disabled by default. Here they can be enabled again.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PARAM_WRITE_NULL_ATTRIBUTES

        public static final String PARAM_WRITE_NULL_ATTRIBUTES
